ygData.subject: Re: Bard songs canceling spell effects, bug or feature?
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, is that all? I just entered duel with a friend, and had them bash me til it stopped, or ran right up to a Gaz Knight and had them bash me a few times :-)
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, is that all? I just entered duel with a friend, and had them bash me til it
stopped, or ran right up to a Gaz Knight and had them bash me a few times :-)



"Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" wrote:

> From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>
>
> you don't have to camp. just like in the past when a procing weapon made
> our songs stick, you can click on and off a song as fast as you can like 15
> or so times to unstick it, it works eventually.
